original_text: And as for their appearances, they four had one likeness, as if a wheel had been in the midst of a wheel.
korean_text: 그 모양은 넷이 꼭 같은데 마치 바퀴 안에 바퀴가 있는 것 같으며

sentences.original_text: as if a wheel had been in the midst of a wheel.
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 바퀴 한 가운데 바퀴가 있는 것 같았다.
